name: A Cabra Dabra
description:
Abracadabra? 

Hi!!! A Cabra Dabra is a puzzle & platform game made for the GBJam-8 where it consists of copying the powers of enemies to complete their stages. This is our first entry as Arara Group and we are happy to participate in this Jam!

 

Programming: Edu

Characters and UI: Luigi

Background art: Ian

The songs are free licensed media:

Title song by MegaPixelMusic: Dawn of Derangements 2

In-game song by Bart: Mushroom Dance

End song by celestialghost8: Victory
